articles.description: David Beckham has never been one to shy away from posting photos of his kids on social media. The soccer player and his wife Victoria Beckham’s sons 21-year-old Brooklyn, 18-year-old Romeo James, 15-year-old Cruz, and daughter 9-year-old Harper Seven have gra…

articles.author: Jami Ganz
articles.title: Candace Cameron Bure speaks on brother Kirk’s maskless caroling - New York Daily News
articles.description: Candace Cameron Bure took to Twitter early on Christmas Eve Thursday to weigh in on big brother Kirk Cameron leading dozens of maskless carolers in defiance of California’s stay-at-home order.

articles.description: We Can Be Heroes movie review: A hammy Priyanka Chopra headlines the adult cast in director Robert Rodriguez’s silly superhero film, aimed squarely at kids.
